name: Al Majid
text: Great place to build your own pizza even if your a vegan they have multiple choices. The service is alright when it's busy. Not the best, in my opinion they need more employees to handle the amount of customers they get. I go mainly becuase I love pizza.

name: BrandoTheMando
text: burned my pizza twice!!! how hard is it to pay attention especially when there are 3 employees working???

name: Christian McGrath
text: Usually very quick and the pie is always killer with lots of variety and diet options.

name: Kaitlyn Balladone
text: Amazing pizza. It smells great the moment you walk in and everything was very clean. Megan the manager was phenomenal and walked me through the process as it was my first time visiting. Definitely will be back!!

name: danielle lahm
text:
Love this place. I usually order delivery through a delivery company and my order is always right.
They are great at taking to accommodating special requests. I wanted no meat on …More

name: Juniper Lund
text: Personally I prefer mod pizza, as their sauce is better as well as their lemonades in my experience. Pieology has improved since I'd last been in by adding different kinds of dough you can get as well as more toppings than I remember. It …More

name: Daniel Altabef
text: This is like Subway (if Subway actually tasted good) for pizza! You select all your toppings for your personal pizza and they bake it while you wait. It tastes good, it's fun to try different combinations and the staff is friendly. Give them a try!

name: Justin McCarley
text: Pretty basic pizza shop. Nice selection of veggie options and fake meats. Fun place for kids to eat and design their own pizza.

name: AMP 2020
text: Went in house for a couple of pizzas with my girlfriend and to only for one feel not welcome by the employees but to also get a pizza that was very undercooked. …More

name: Celina Beatty
text: Yummy pizza and salads!! I love the "build your own" concept for one price...all the toppings you want!! The cauliflower crust is good, but I like the tavern thin crust better. The pesto is delicious. I will definitely be back!!

name: Chris Ugelstad
text: I like the idea of being able to build your own pizza. They have a lot of extras and toppings and herbs and cheeses to accommodate your pizza. Me and a friend were there before the lunch rush, not sure how they handle that. Pizza was hot and tasty.

name: Craig Plummer
text: Good custom pizzas! Endless options to choose from! Quick and fresh!

name: Gordon Wilson
text: Tons of choices, very affordable, they have added thick crust. Employee was very helpful and definitely efficient.

name: Bob Seashore
text: The place was filthy. I wish I had seen it before ordering food. The restroom did not look it had been cleaned in days. The dinning room had dirty tables and there was drippings from the garbage cans on the floor showing that the floor had …More

name: Paige Williams
text: Watched an employee sneeze and then refuse to wash his hands and change his gloves. He was a young Asian man with long hair. I'm disgusted

name: Elizabeth Schick
text: Went there today and it was extremely dirty. Not only was there food everywhere but thei girls kept using the same dirty gloves for each order. They are also very slow. …More

name: Derek Burton
text: Super nice staff, restaurant clean. The "pizza" if you can call it that, was some of the worst we've ever eaten. The deep dish was not a "crust" at all, just pizza sauce on a pack of cheap dinner rolls- inedible. The artisan thin crust was …More

name: Stacy Jones-Malik
text: Wood fired pizza, but the edges were burnt pretty black and charred. The red sauce was nothing special and the staff was not super knowledgeable, though nice.

name: christina cudworth
text: Love this pizza for when the family cant decide on one type. You can get as many toppings as you'd like so that's always fun making different combos!

name: Francisca Machic
text: I love the fact that you get to choose what to put on your pizza. One of my favorite places! 😀

name: John Robison
text: They went out of their way to meat all of my allergy needs -- sov very much appreciated. The food was wonderful.

name: Justin Parent
text: Awesome place to get lunch! Great staff with exceptional customer service. Pizza is always cooked perfect and tastes so good. Coming here is always a highlight to my day! From all of us at Beaverton Motorcycles THANK YOU and keep up the good work.

name: Wes Metz
text: Very similar to MOD Pizza with more crust options and after 4 pm, add a pint for only $1.20. Friendly, accommodating staff.

name: Paul Iford
text: Felt bad for ordering the cheese stuff crust as it took a wicked long time to make them. …More

name: Merlene Berg
text: How can you go wrong designing your own pizza?? The ingredients are consistently fresh and the workers friendly. Great prices and yummy pizza.

name: FamilyHero Channel
text: Amazing food,  pizza was amazing but only 2 out of 5 stars because the mens restroom was disgusting. Someone had urinated all over the toilet paper and the toilet seat covers also all over the floor and toilet. When I told the staff what …More

name: Sean Gillies
text: Love the new vegan options! 3 great plant based meats, daiya cheese and thick crust! The prices are definitely inflated for the vegan 'add ons'. If you're in the area it's a great quick stop to get some tasty pizza.

name: Lisa Horowitz
text: Tonight at dinner every table in the restaurant was dirty and it wasn’t busy at all. Also, they offer gluten free pizza but use the same utensil to spread the sauce on the gluten free crust and the regular crust.

name: Beth Sethi
text: Pizza good, only one staff member working on a weekend around noon. Unusually long wait (probably 25 minutes from the time we arrived until we got pizza). Not terrible but long for pieology.

name: Phat Nguyen
text: Pretty nice to make your own pizza with a reasonable price.

name: Lori Brimer
text: Definitely one of the best experiences I've had with pieology. Kirstin was very friendly and talkative, answered any questions I had and explained everything very thoroughly. Sounds like she just took over that store but she is doing an …More

name: Joshua Horner
text: Have eaten at this location many times. Good food and great service.  I prefer the new menu which is assemble whatever toppings you want on whichever crust you choose.

name: Vishwas Setty
text: Awesome pizzas, the cauliflower crust is amazing. Would love to go there anytime when am in the mood for pizza..

name: Gena Williams
text: Kristin was super helpful! Everything was fresh. Place is clean and bright. Pizza, salad and cheese bread were all great. We'll be back.

name: Sharon Royston
text: Not only were they out of many toppings and dough,  the amount of vegetables they put on was pathetic - and that's all so was getting. I had to ask several times if more toppings would be put on and they didn't until I complained. It was …More

name: carly hins
text: Kirstin was amazing! She was fast and punctual but also very friendly. She made sure that our pizza and salad were made exactly how we wanted it. I will definitely be returning to this store because of her customer service.

name: Tessa Nunley
text: The new GM at this location is AWESOME she is so helpful and all around a sweet girl!! Such a friendly inviting staff. Their new pierise crust is to die for. Definitely my go to for lunch stops or dinner with the family. Keep it up..!

name: Jace Olsen
text: GREAT PIZZA the wait times after you make the pizza are around 7-10 mins. But that's to be expected with there cooking meathod this ain't no little ceasers.

name: The Liz
text: Welcomed in - served promptly & courteously....fantastic food!!

name: Niki Alipoor
text: Alton took care of me and my two coworkers during our lunch break. He was so kind, quick, and thoughtful. We appreciate the wonderful service we were given. We will be back and will recommend this location to others as well.

name: Kristina Kimmel
text: It's a Subway for pizza.. So fresh and yummy.

name: Leif Odegard
text: This is what happens when you mate Subway with a fire oven pizza restaurant. The results are spectacular. Being able to personalize your pizza to your specific taste (read: lots of meat) is very rewarding. This place comes highly recommended. They have great service and prices.

name: Ross Hammer
text: If you love pizza then you'll most likely love Pieology. Flat rate pricing based on your selected crust size. Pile on any of their gourmet toppings, ready in just several minutes. Fresh, delicious, and always exactly to order.

name: Robert Cousineau
text: The food here is both really quite good and fairly priced.  I'm personally a huge fan of the 3 dollar desert pizzas.  Service is almost always friendly, but they could definitely do with hiring more people.  Overall, I'd reccomend.

name: Tonya Mosher
text: Great food. Awesome service. Fresh ingredients.

name: Kevin Oyama
text: Fast service by the friendliest folks ever. Great menu options and a nice soda fountain selection unlike some other pizza places with only natural sugared drinks.

name: PNW GRL
text: Pizza was good, yet toppings were scarce, even after asking for additional. A Caprese pizza should have numerous tomatoes and basil.

name: The Gohan
text: Customize your own pizza with unlimited number of toppings for a great price. Made with fresh ingredients it makes it that much better and the ooey gooey cheese bread is to die for. Best pizza I have ever had

name: M n H
text: Excellent pizza!  The flavor was fantastic and tasted like it was double the price.

name: John Watson
text: Really good food good location I would just wish they had more of them say in Salem Oregon.

name: Lucy
text: Excellent pizza with a very good 'Pie and a pint' happy hour deal

name: Colleen Wilson
text: I love this place. Pizza is delicious! Salads are the best. MEGAN is amazing and all her staff too. I recommend this place to any and everyone who want's to experience perfection! I go there and everyone from my company goes there!!!!!

name: Larry Morandi
text: Ok, but not great pizza. One size only, good for one hungry person or two light eaters. Place reminds me of a taqueria, since you pick a crust, then tell them the toppings as you sidle down toward the cash register. Many more interesting pizza places in the Portland area.

name: Master rugged Jesus
text: Best place to go for a quick wood fired pizza! Lots of options and really good drinks.

name: Briar Voy
text: The new manager Meg has phenomenal customer service and was very friendly.  We were quite impressed and the food is good too! Pieology is lucky they have such a nice manager to keep people feel welcome and keep coming back

name: Karen Nicholson
text: So delicious! My 6 yo says "Awesome!" Love that each child could create their own pie. I had the original greens salad with chicken, blue cheese , cranberries and walnuts. Perfect with red wine for mom. Upscale version of a quick course subway or chipotle lunch. We'll be back!

name: Iyonna Mora
text: Really craved some pizza and so a friend and I drove to pieology, in short the hours listed on the website are not the hours listed on the store front and should be updated immediately. …More

name: Emily Dougherty
text: Delicious pizza! My pizza was perfectly made to my specifications, the pie-rista (I’m making up words) was friendly and didn’t make me feel rushed even though they were busy. She even gave me a good deal when it was time to pay. I will definitely come back for my pizza cravings!

name: Megan Howerton
text: Definitely give this place five stars! Everyone is so friendly and welcoming! The food Is a must try! Fast enough for lunch is their goal and they definitely hit it! A+ for sure!!

name: Emalee Long
text: First time ever at Pieology and I highly recommend. Great service, great pizza, and they are quick!

name: Alton Lovincey
text: Damn near the best store on the planet, staff was just wonderful. Food tasted exceptional couldn’t ask for anything more!! 10/10 would recommend

name: Josephine LaMon
text: Delicious! Loved that you could watch you pizza cook.

name: Brian Hensley
text: To be honest, it's a more expensive, lower quality Mod pizza. The concept is nice, but with so many pizza options on the market I don't see this variation lasting 10 years from now. The cheese and dough quality was the lacking piece for …More

name: Ethel Murakami
text: Fast.  Like choosing your own toppings.  Efficient

name: Kyle Kennedy
text: Much better than mod pizza, the dough is heads and shoulders above the competition. …More

name: J W
text:
Nice location, 15 miles from me but it's worth it since I refuse to go to MOD that's right across the street 😁
Kind & helpful staff …More

name: Sabrina Scott
text: Went to Pieology this eve & arrived 20 mins before closing. There were 4 people in line ahead of me. After about 5 mins, the line hadn't moved & I realized the 1st lady in line was getting 7-8 pizzas.... …More

name: vishal rayabarapu
text: They don’t respect customers...no lemons...please improve your service

name: Dimuyen _
text: Pizzas are consistently tasty and what you'd expect. This location is usually low foot traffic and always turns out slower than other fast food when ordering multiple pizzas.

name: Dustin Hughes
text: If your the owner of this business. Schedule more than 2 people on nights you need more. Your quality and service suffer due to bad attitudes

name: Jade Coon
text: Great service and a good place to stop by for a quick eat! Very satisfied with our visit

name: jessie jarman
text: Much better pizza than mod. The use a better suace and the have a base of either butter or butter with herbs. The workers are extremely customer oriented and when the traffic is slow you can really tell they go out of their way to make you feel welcomed

name: Jonathan Corbett
text: For $9 a pie, and all the options, this is a great place to stop by for a quick pizza. Think of it like the Subway of pizza shops, with dozens of options and multiple crust choices. Not the best pizza I have ever had, but a solid choice when you want something easy.

name: Michael Fryer
text: Great place to have a quick bit to eat. The quality of the food was good. The prices was great. Would go back everyday if there was one closer to me.

name: Garrett Dylan
text:
$8 for a fresh made personal pie in ~5mins, plus unlimited toppings? Can't beat that! Tasty too.
Minus 1 star because the pizza measured in at ~9.5" instead of the advertised …More

name: Charles Duit
text: We had a great meal and good service.

name: Danielle Ruiz
text: great service! extremely friendly workers! and tastes great! an all around win!

name: Axan Ruarc
text: I really enjoy the food and the way it is prepared, but the tables are almost never clean.

name: adam sparks
text: Great group of people who work at a great place to grab great pizza. Do you know what that makes this place? Grand. It makes it grand.

name: Melissa Gorton
text: Globs of oil put on pizza, several hairs found in pizza because new employee didnt have hair fully tied back, also didnt know what she was doing. Was not the best experience.

name: E M
text: Manager got all mad cause I asked make me another pizza. Sorry but I don't like when one side of pizza is soggy. And outside crust all black

name: Jim Mccullough
text: Enjoyed being able to customize and was very good.

name: eric tengs
text: Good pies for the price. I prefer the crust and some toppings at Mod Pizza. $5 for a little plastic cup of beer isn't such a good deal though.

name: Ray Sanford
text: Great Pizza.  Great Price.  Fast!!! Needs more draft beer taps.

name: hunter hernandez
text: Great place to eat and has amazing food and great service. They know exactly what they are doing👍🏻 my favorite restaurant

name: Mindi Martinez
text: Great cauliflower crust!

name: Coach Shiley
text: I love this place. It's almost like subway/Chipotle for pizza, you choose what you want from a large variety of toppings and sauces, and it's baked in just a few minutes. Great prices too.

name: Megan Myers
text: Sweet Mercy!!!!! This place made the fat kid inside me so sooooo happy :) fast service & fun to go to.

name: Mark Lewis Brown
text: Very yummy and quick!

name: Nellie Basargin
text: Absolutely terrible customer service!!!!! We ordered 2 separate orders but she combined the orders into one when we specified 3 times that it was separate. Instead of having her have to refund us we left it and I paid my friend for my order …More

name: Doug Finch
text: Go to MOD, fresher ingredients,  better service and so on

name: Corinne La Fors
text: Flavor explosion and amazing deep dish pizza crust. Cant wait to go back.

name: Debbie Patten
text: Great pizza! We've visited MOD Pizza and thought we wouldn't like it as well, but it was delicious. We'll eat here again.

name: Yvonne Price
text: Very good pizza!

name: Jean Devenport
text: Love choosing all my favorite toppings! Great customer service!

name: Christian Day
text: This place is absolutely disgusting!!! I just ate a pizza from here and now I feel like I'm going to be sick. I couldn't even eat more then one piece. Do not eat here!!!  And the employees there are extremely pushy about what topping to put …More

name: Megan Griffin
text: The food is okay, but if you go when it's busy expect the wait to be a while. And the lack of a changing table really off-putting I had to change my daughter on her stroller in the bathroom which was a nightmare. So I don't know that I'd go back unless someone I was with wanted to.

name: Trey P.
text: I wasn't that impressed. I did not feel like the quality of the ingredients was as good as MOD Pizza. The salad was way too expensive for what I got. It was $9 and seriously only had about 5 bites of lettuce. My husbands pizza was just ok and not up to MOD Pizza's standards. We wont be back.

name: Alaina Worden
text: Great service, great pizza, great price!

name: Sean Heupel
text: Mediocre, slower than places like it and overpriced.  It's only real value is the location. It is faster than Red Robin, but I don't plan on wasting my money there, again.

name: Adam Lewis
text: Ordered deep dish. It was terrible.

name: james standal
text: It is Pielogy. It is quick. It is cheap. It is just what you expect.

name: Blaine Bauer
text: Great pizza for the price

name: mason ringo
text: Bad customer service they dont clean the tables the parmesan container is empty

name: David Read
text: Pretty good roll your own pizza.

name: Donna Casteel
text: Eat here if you prefer your pizza burnt.

name: Melanie Jenkins
text: Good pizza. Price is good. Ingredient options good and fresh. Good microbrews. Brought the basketball team here. They handled the unexpected large crowd (25 ppl) very well.

name: Daniel Narvaez
text: Awesome service, fast turnaround and great pizza!

name: Harriett Chambers
text: Always enjoy my customized pizza

name: Kimberly Johnson
text: I like that they offered a Pi Day special, but was disappointed it was advertised in small print only to elite members. Still, like the concept and the wood fire baking.

name: Christy Rowden
text: This is a great place to have lunch. Fast and being able to customize your own pizza is great.

name: Tessa Nunley
text: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THE PIZZA! and the service was amazing.

name: James Stone
text: I've been twice so far and its hit or miss on the pizza. Staff is bland with no personality.

name: Ro Ta
text: I have been coming here since they opened.  They have the best gf crust.  Excellent toppings options and very quick.

name: Chris Giles
text: Great service.  Great pizza too.  The crusts are amazing.

text: Amazing place Josh made sure everyone was please with everything even when there was mishaps all in all great food and atmosphere

name: Stacey Wanous
text: Not much available to eat and seems expensive

name: jin amole
text: If your BLACK! they will absolutely forget about your order!like you don't exist..more of like a shadow!!

name: DC Smith Enterprises
text: Megan and her crew have great service with smiles,A+ 5 stars all the way,she's a great G.M, plus great pizza.. but Service is a must.Awesome !! More Great Service shown by Christine the asst mngr on duty tonight 5 more stars

name: David Gregory
text: OK pizza.  The crust seemed, I don't know, overcooked or old.  One pizza was kind of blah and the other one was pretty good.  The parking lot is usually pretty packed here also.

name: Chris Dinardo
text: Fast service,  good pizza and a plethora of toppings.  What not to like. Yummy yummy yummy

name: Bridget Marcano
text: Love love the pizza .... Wish you were in Salem..... Thank you for the great service. You guys rock😁😁😁

name: Kevin Ferguson
text: Horrible. Me and my girlfriend have been up puking and nauseous for 12 house since we ate your food due to probably food poisoning... Disappointing. On top of that it was my birthday pzza.

name: Hannah Smith
text: MMMM 👌🏼

name: Miriam Thomas
text: I've only had good experiences with this location. The food itself is wonderful but it helps to have friendly and helpful staff!

name: Josh Ellis
text: Manager there was awesome

name: J. Noonan
text: Great build-your-own pizza.

name: E W
text:
We normally eat at Tualatin location this location was messy, service poor. Cross contamination horrible for a place that offers gluten and allergy friendly options this was really bad.
Won’t be returning to this location.

name: Bryton Massie
text: Great food, better than MOD Pizza, and great service.

name: Adrienne Hull
text: First time in and they didn't even greet me and they forgot my chicken on my bbq chicken pizza. Still a good pizza, just disappointing.

name: J Moore
text: Always fast friendly and delicious.

name: Chris Haverkate
text: Tasty pizza, with whole wheat and gluten free options, made exactly the way you like!

name: jezabel057
text: KYLIE and the team are ALWAYS  ON POINT HERE !! Service is amazing

name: Sadat Adams
text: I took down a whole pizza in one sitting and I have the itis right now

name: Liisa Wirkkula-Niemi
text: great  quick and some of the best flavored pizza I have ever had...even with the really thin crust... definitely  two thumbs up!!!!

name: Jim Au
text: Excellent pizza and good price

name: Tyler Bell
text: Pizza was under 11.5" by a decent margin. The pizzas taste great though

name: Marie Fromont
text: Good, fast, customizable pizza.  $8 for a fairly large, fresh, individual pizza- great find for lunch!

name: Ivan Bissell
text: Went out of my way just so I could take this goodness all the way back to Saint Helens!  Hope it makes it!

name: Dahr-wynn Blakemore
text: Good crust, great service, and fast pizza of my own creation.

name: Elmer F. Brisbois II
text: Pies were gr8 the assemble was quick with gr8 assortment of ingredients

name: Kyle Freeman
text: Very clean, affordable, make-it-yourself pizza with a friendly and welcoming staff.

text: WORST pizza. Ive gottten food poisoning every time I eat here. The most recent pizza I had, had EXTRA garlic all over the pizza, it was so bad it was not eatable. I DO NOT recomand this place to anyone.

text: Nobody makes a pizza, the way I do

text: There are so many places to get custom pizzas I really wouldn't consider this one.

text: Really nice pizza

name: Ben Orth
text: Great selection of toppings, delicious crust, and quick! This is a must-go!

name: Kelly McKiernan
text: Wildly variable quality, depending on the trainee of the day, from "OK, I guess" to "inedible". My last undercooked pie there was still cold and doughy, and only half the crust had toppings. Won't be returning.
